text: Gino Cappelletti (March 26, 1934 â€“ May 12, 2022) was an American professional football player. He played college football at University of Minnesota. He played for the Boston Patriots from 1960 until 1970. Cappelletti is a member of the Patriots Hall of Fame. He was the Patriots' radio color commentator until July 2012. His nicknames included "The Duke" and "Mr. Patriot". Cappelletti was born in Keewatin, Minnesota. Cappelletti died on May 12, 2022 at the age of 89.Patriots Hall of Fame WR/K Gino Cappelletti Passes Away at 89 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New England Patriots players Category:American sports commentators Category:American radio personalities Category:Sportspeople from Minnesota Category:American football wide receivers
title: Gino Cappelletti
